review: One day I just dragged and dropped a movie file right into a Chrome tab and it began to play right in the browser window, then I just cast the tab.  So I don't have to use plex or do anything else first before I can play downloaded videos.  I'm not even sure many people know you can do this.  This feature alone was worth the cost for me.
author: J.P.

review: I've been going back and fourth trying to decided whether to get this or not.  At first I wasn't a fan, then after understanding it more, (I use to use software like synergy)  there's not a night that goes by without me using it to cast movies to my bedroom; or as a systems admin I leave the TV on and cast my co-located production server information. Glad I purchased it!
